message:
Does anybody know of companies operating in Egypt that can customize, deploy and support a Moodle system for a medical college in Cairo? The project might entail provision of hardware and infrastructure for a 100-machine computer lab.

This is not exactly a job posting but it borders on being one. so I apologize if this is ,indeed , an out-of-place post

data.message: Have you checked Edx's source code?!

It is a lot more mature system than Moodle :

http://code.edx.org/

Quite frankly, I'm not at all locked on one product. We have been offered a proprietary system by a company in Cairo and the most appealing aspect of it is the support. So I am looking around for a company that could deploy an open source E-learning system and, more importantly, maintain it.
